mapper.insert: insert into user ( id, username, password, sex, age, phone, email, enable, type, dept_id, create_time) values (#{id}, #{username}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{enable}, #{type}, #{dept.id}, #{creatTime})

insert into user ( id, username, password, sex, age, phone, email, enable, type, dept_id, create_time) values
(#{item.id}, #{item.username}, #{item.password}, #{item.sex}, #{item.age}, #{item.phone}, #{item.email}, #{item.enable}, #{item.type}, #{item.dept.id}, #{item.creatTime})
